title: Payment calculator
description: Discover spacious living and exceptional storage in this beautifully appointed one-bedroom, one-bath residence in one of New York City's most desirable neighborhoods.    & nbsp; The expansive great room is thoughtfully designed to accommodate both living and dining areas, framed by wide north-facing windows that flood the space with natural light. The renovated kitchen is a chef's delight, offering full-size appliances-including a gas range and dishwasher, ample counter space , glass subway tile backsplash , and abundant cabinetry. The tranquil bedroom includes its own windows and flows into a dressing area with generous custom closet space. Beyond, the updated bathroom features a full bathtub. Throughout the home, hardwood floors add warmth and elegance, while additional closets at the entry provide even more storage.   All utilities are included in the maintenance fee-no monthly electric bills.   Gramercy Park Towers is a premier post-war cooperative offering a 24-hour doorman and concierge, state-of-the-art fitness center, peaceful Zen garden, on-site parking, bike storage, and an impressive roof deck with panoramic views of Manhattan. Ideally situated near Union Square and the Flatiron District, you'll have world-class dining, shopping, entertainment, and cultural venues just steps away, along with easy access to the N/Q/R, 4/5/6, and L subway lines.    & nbsp; Please note: pieds- & agrave; -terre are not permitted.   & nbsp; Pets are welcome!
